Accessibility Toolkit Pro

- Single-file HTML app with inline CSS and JS (no external dependencies).
- Fixed toolbar at top of viewport (position: fixed; z-index: 9999) with 12 toggle buttons for WCAG-inspired accessibility features.
- **Core features** (all keyboard-accessible via Tab/Enter/Space, with visible focus outlines):
  - **High Contrast**: Toggle extreme black/white mode (4.5:1+ ratio).
  - **Big Text**: Scale font-size 1.5x-2x via CSS variables/rem units.
  - **Readable Fonts**: Switch to OpenDyslexic-like font stack (system serif + custom kerning).
  - **Reading Guide**: Animated horizontal line follows reading position (mouse scroll or keyboard).
  - **Invert Colors**: CSS filter: invert(1) with hue adjustments.
  - **Grayscale**: CSS filter: grayscale(100%).
  - **Link Highlight**: Underline + glow all <a> tags.
  - **Hide Images**: display: none on img elements (toggle reveals).
  - **Cursor Enlarge**: 2x mouse cursor size via custom ::-webkit-zoom-in/-moz-zoom-in.
  - **Skip Nav**: Hidden "Skip to Main Content" link (Tab once to focus).
  - **Text-to-Speech**: Select text + button reads via SpeechSynthesis API (pause/resume controls).
  - **Dark/Light Auto**: Detects prefers-color-scheme, manual override toggle.
- **Drag-and-Drop**: Drag toolbar anywhere on screen (persists via localStorage position).
- **Undo/Redo**: Ctrl+Z/Y reverts last 5 toggles (history stack in localStorage).
- **Persistence**: All settings + toolbar position saved to localStorage, auto-applies on load.
- **Keyboard Shortcuts**: Alt+1-9 for toggles 1-9; Alt+0 toggle toolbar; Esc reset all.
- **Mobile/Responsive**: Touch-friendly buttons (48px min), scales to viewport.
- **ARIA Compliance**: All buttons have role=button, aria-pressed, aria-labels; live region announces changes.
- **Testable flows**:
  1. Load page → toolbar appears → Tab through buttons → Enter toggles.
  2. Drag toolbar → reload → position persists.
  3. Enable Big Text + High Contrast → text scales/contrasts → Ctrl+Z undoes.
  4. Select paragraph → TTS button → hears speech.
- CSS: Use CSS custom properties (--text-size: 1rem; etc.) for live updates.
- JS: Event listeners on buttons, mutation observer for dynamic content, no frameworks.
- Max ~800 LOC: Compact, modular functions for each toggle.
